name: Baby ko
greetingText: It's that time of the year na.
wishText: I want to say happy birthday to my loveliest baby pup ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you, my love. This is your first birthday with me and I wanted to make it special kaso tinulugan mo ko hahaha. I'm not mad, just disappointed kase di mo to makikita ng saktong 12 dahil nga tulog ka. Pero baby ko, I'm so thankful nakilala kita. You made my world so much more brighter than it was before. Fits you the nickname Lune. Baby ko I hope you don't mind na ganto gift ko sayo hahaha. Mahal na mahal kita Chloie :) Sana sa mga susunod na birthdays naten, tayo pa rin ang magkasama hanggang sa dumating na sina Ivory. I love you mahal ko, happiest birthday to you ;)
text2: Dapat nga, simpleng link lang bibigay ko.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
